title: FS: HOF, SL, Some Backs, Portraits etc. etc. etc.
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FS: HOF, SL, Some Backs, Portraits etc. etc. etc.
posts.post_content:
Good morning and afternoon.

I have some nice T206 available for sale should anyone have interest. If you would like scans please feel free to write me at t206society@gmail.com. You can also pm me, though it may take just a bit longer for me to respond.

1.)  Hughie Jennings (HOF) "One hand shows" - Piedmont 350 (PSA 6) SOLD

2.) John McGraw (HOF) "Portrait - Cap" - SC 350-460 f. 42 OP (SGC 4) SOLD

3.) John McGraw (HOF) "Finger in air" - Piedmont 150 (SGC 4) SOLD

4.) John McGraw (HOF) "Glove at hip" - SC 350-460 f. 42 (SGC 4)

5.) Miller Huggins (HOF) "Portrait" - Piedmont 350 (SGC 4.5) SOLD

6.) Elmer Flick (HOF) - Piedmont 350 (SGC 4)

7.) Jake Beckley (HOF) - Piedmont 350 (SGC 4)

8.) Fred Clarke (HOF) "Holding bat" - Piedmont 350 (SGC 4)

9.) Joe Kelley (HOF) - SC 350 f. 30 (SGC 4)

10.) George Davis (HOF) - SC 350 f. 30 (SGC 4) SOLD

11.) Bobby Wallace (HOF) - SC 150 f. 30 (SGC 4)

12.) Rube Waddell (HOF) "Portrait" - Piedmont 150 (SGC 4) SOLD

13.) Eddie Collins (HOF) - Piedmont 350 (SGC 3)  SOLD

14.) Mordecai Brown (HOF) "Portrait" - Piedmont 150 (SGC 3) SOLD

15.) Addie Joss (HOF) "Portrait" - Piedmont 150 (SGC 3)

16.) Shag Shaughnessy (SL) - Piedmont 350 (SGC 4)   SOLD

17.) Ed Foster (SL) - Old Mill SL (SGC 4)

18.) Happy Smith "Brooklyn" - Lenox (PSA 2.5) SOLD

19.) Hal Chase "Dark Cap" - Sovereign 460 (PSA 2 - MC)

20.) Frank Chance (HOF) "Yellow Portrait" - SC 350 f. 30 (SGC 4)  SOLD

21.) Joe Tinker (HOF) "Portrait" - Piedmont 150 (PSA 3)

22.) John McGraw (HOF) "Portrait w/ Cap" - Piedmont 350-460 f. 25 (SGC 3)

23.) Miller Huggins (HOF) "Portrait" - Cycle 350 (SGC 5) SOLD

24.) Nap Lajoie (HOF) "With Bat" - Tolstoi (SGC 5.5)

Hi all. I just wanted to give this thread a friendly bump to reflect some additions and some price reductions. If you are interested in scans or pricing please feel free to contact me at: t206society@gmail.com.

Thank you.

Derek

Just wanted to offer a friendly bump for some nice T206 :)

If you would like images and pricing please feel free to contact me at: t206society@gmail.com

Thank you!

Derek

How much for the Chase?

Cheers,
Geno

Hello.

I wanted to do a friendly bump on this group. There are still some nice ones left and also a few price reductions.

If you are interested please feel free to email me: t206society@gmail.com and I will be happy to provide imagery and pricing.

Thank you very much.

Respectfully,

Derek
